topics.body:
So just a second ago I heard my brother talking to my mom and yelling and screaming and I'm like "Whats going on?"

So I go out there, he was talking to mom about the pizza she bought and said "This pizza is fucking BAD its SATAN SPAWN"

So I tried a slice......You know, I always wondered what dick tastes like. Well what ever it tastes like its _better then this_. 

This was the most ranktastic Pizza I have ever had the displeasure to slither down my taste buds, I didn't even swallow it I spit it out like someone giving head for the first time.

That shit tasted like someone sprinkled the body parts of pixies and began to piss and fap on it and fed it to you with a side of rotten milk that had elephant shit in it. 

Give me some sand paper, I need to get this taste out of my mouth before a Xenomorph busts out of my stomach and then dies from how bad that pizza tasted.
